Description: Part of a limestone column-base with relief decoration: central geometric motif flanked by two birds; fragment has become detached.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie (1922, on behalf of BSAE)
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1925b / Tombs of the courtiers and Oxyrhynkhos (p.18, pl.47.7)
Krumeich 2003 / Spätantike Bauskulptur aus Oxyrhynchos : lokale Produktion, äussere Einflüsse (G-185 (p.144, pls.8c, 111))
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
